attributes.description: Our POLO GP is in great condition both inside and out. Included is a 2 year, unlimited mileage, mechanical warranty along with roadside assistance. The car performs very well and is exceptionally light on fuel too. It has some great options too (Which cost over R 35 000): Panoramic sun roof, Full leather trim, Smash and Grab safety film, 17 inch alloys, Front and rear spoilers. It was recently serviced, 4 new tyres fitted and all 4 shocks replaced. Call for more info and to arrange a viewing.

attributes.description: We at Stander Motors pride ourselves in delivering excellent service. We are a family business that opened our doors in 1989 in Dunnottar, since then we moved our business to Nigel in 1994. Come and visit us on 66 Hendrik Verwoerd Str Nigel and meet our friendly staff. We go the extra mile to give our clients only the best. It has the following Towbar, Roof rack, T/cover, Side steps, Power steering, Air conditioning, Electric windows, Airbags, Anti-lock braking system (ABS), Remote central locking. Finance available at all major banks, Trade-inn welcome, Nationwide delivery. Call us today for fast and friendly service
